x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying rectangle x-locations

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vector of valuescontaining a "b" combined with a numeric value specifyingrectangle y-locations

width.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying rectangle widths

height.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying rectangle heights

just.description: Justification of rectangle relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, and \code{height} are only given asnumerics or numeric vectors

linecolor.description: A character value specifying rectangle line color

lwd.description: A numeric specifying rectangle line width

lty.description: A numeric specifying rectangle line type

fill.description: A character value specifying rectangle fill color

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
